Error: couldn't find RGB GLX visual or fbconfig: Xlib
video card?
geforce 8800gtx
it did not make any difference.
there's a kernel module for nvidia ... make sure you pull that out, purge the nvidia package, then reinstall.

in Aptitude, just select to Mark for Complete Removal
that is done. I removed all nvidia packages
